Description:
Model
Brand: TOSHIBA
Series: Canvio Basics
Model: HDTB420XK3AA


Performance
Color: Charcoal Black
Interface: USB 3.0
Capacity: 2TB


Features
Features: Easy to use
Discover one of the easiest ways to add storage to your computer with Toshiba's Canvio Basics portable hard drive, offering simple plug-and-play operation. Ready to use with your PC4 and no software installation required. Intuitively drag and drop files to and from your PC or laptop.

All You Need, Wherever You Go
Canvio Basics offers the space to collect in a size you can take anywhere. Introducing a new sleek, matte-black design that is more compact than ever, the Canvio Basics is a true portable hard drive - easy to carry and store in any pocket or bag.

Store with Confidence
The Canvio Basics is built to Toshiba's world-class quality standards, offering time-tested reliability.
System Requirements: Formatted NTFS for Microsoft Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 7
Requires reformatting for Mac OS v10.15 / v10.14 / v10.13
Available USB 2.0 or USB 3.0 Port


Dimensions & Weight
Dimensions: 0.55" x 3.10" x 4.30"
Weight: 0.33 lb.


Packaging
Package Contents: Toshiba Canvio Basics Portable Hard Drive
USB 3.0 Cable (works with USB 2.0)
Quick Start Guide
Label: Toshiba Canvio Basics
